programme.desc: Destination Myanmar will take the audience to some of Myanmar's most beautiful and stunning Asian Heritage wetlands with fishermen paddling one-legged along shallow waters and floating gardens.

programme.title: Jaguarland
programme.desc: Explore a 400 square mile region of the Pantanal where jaguars rule and life follows the seasonal rhythm of the water.

programme.title: Naledi: A Baby Elephant's Tale
programme.desc: Naledi follows the journey of a baby elephant orphaned in a rescue camp, as the man tasked with her survival races to protect an entire species while fighting to save her life.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, the first animals had eyes that were unable to distinguish color -- yet as that changed, ‘seeing in color’ gave animals many advantages, whether to find food, attract a mate or warn off an enemy.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals some of the natural world’s most cunning tricksters and masters of disguise. Discover how some animals use color to hide and disappear into the background, or to trick and deceive.

programme.title: Destination China: Yunnan
programme.desc: Destination China will take the audience to some of Yunnan's most beautiful and stunning landscapes and homes to around 6000 species of plants, 200 mammals and 500 species of birds.

programme.title: Destination Myanmar
programme.desc: Destination Myanmar will take the audience to some of Myanmar's most beautiful and stunning Asian Heritage wetlands with fishermen paddling one-legged along shallow waters and floating gardens.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum S3
programme.desc: This week at the V&A, a pink lamé suit for a menswear exhibit, a 10-tonne slice of Robin Hood Gardens for V&A East, a bionic arm for Young V&A, and Eric Ravilious's 'Travel' tea set are featured.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum S3
programme.desc: V&A curators uncover untold stories in objects, featuring African fashion, a kente cloth, a James Barnor photograph, and a puzzling 'Ancient Persian' dish.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Museum S3
programme.desc: This week, "Secrets of the Museum" spotlights industry and design. Curator Martin preps a Maurice Broomfield photo exhibit, while Jenny receives a rare Biba production file. Also featured: a jamdani stole and Josiah Wedgwood's pottery trials.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals some of the natural world’s most cunning tricksters and masters of disguise. Discover how some animals use color to hide and disappear into the background, or to trick and deceive.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: Find out the stories behind the scientific research on animal colors - from robotic frogs wrestling with real-life counterparts, to spiders wearing eyeliner to attract mates.

programme.title: Iberia's Woodlands
programme.desc: Narrated by acclaimed English actor Bill Nighy, this blue-chip natural history series reveals the challenges faced by the astounding and rare creatures that make this unique environment their home.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Ben’s travels to Hastings and discovers a holistic fully vertically integrated approach to creating grass fed Angus beef. He ventures to the local farmers market and meets amazing local food producers, reinforcing the abundance of produce grown in the region.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Ben’s meets an Orchardist and Food Innovation specialist. They have a shared vision to make all natural varietal – led apple juice, using the best technology in the world. He also checks out over 30 varieties of figs grown in the Mediterranean type climate of Hawkes Bay.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Ben takes a boat to visit a salmon farm in Akaroa and learns the difference between NZ King and Atlantic salmon. He catches salmon and cooks it on the shoreline overlooking the harbour. He checks out a high-quality homegrown culinary oil that’s both healthy and versatile, highlighting a commitment to local agriculture and sustainability.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: It’s stone fruit season! Ben visits a family run orchard in Central Otago known for its long season of stone fruit and a strong connection to the land and community. He discovers an all-electric cherry farm where premium export cherries are sold direct to Kiwis.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Ben experiences the Ruapehu’s region emerging food story and rich history of market gardening. He meets a sixth generation farmer who has turned a remote wilderness into a thriving eco-tourism and fine dining destination, alongside an award winning chef.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Ben’s food journey starts in the West Coast of the South Island. He meets the only NZ cranberry producer at a farm in Hokitika and travels to Blackball to learn how chorizo is made. He cooks a range of dishes at the beach incorporating these local delicacies, matched with a local beer.

programme.title: Janet Jackson: The Art Of Seduction
programme.desc: Noted for her fierce independence, her magnetic aura and her ever so charming voice, Janet Jackson became a catalyst for her growth on MTV; embracing her identity, and reaching up to the heights of stardom.

programme.title: JLo: Triple Threat
programme.desc: Step into the world of Jennifer Lopez, a dominant figure in the entertainment industry whose journey from humble beginnings to A-list stardom is nothing short of inspirational.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yi’s magic works, they notice that Everest isn’t looking too hot. In fact, he’s too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home – until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that they’ve made over the kids’ rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced they’re the better team leader. Without it, the sewer’s water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora, Boots, and Map help Tío Tesoro find his treasure trackers and become a treasure map again. // Dora and Boots investigate a mysterious key so they can discover more about Dora's great-great grandma, the first exploradora.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Special Mission Blaze is on the case! When the Baby Robot from Outer Space turns everyone into babies, it's up to Blaze and his new Special Mission Modes to save the day! Can he rescue his friends, or will he be the next baby on the block?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tim, Tommy, Tia and Dad get stuck on a remote asteroid. // Tim, Kai and Tommy try to get their ball back from Mum's bedroom. // Tia's new balloon gets stuck in a tree, so Tim tries to get it down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: A drone carrying Humdinger's reflecting panel crashes in a tree, the reflector concentrates a beam of light on a wooden bridge, causing it to burn. // The Paw Patrol rescues Winnie and a capybara when they go rolling off in a giant exercise ball.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger becomes HumCatDingerMan to steal the spotlight from the Cat Pack. // The pups must save Granny Tilly when an impromptu Turbot Tournament gets overly competitive.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: The pups jump into action to build an observatory to help their friend River get a cool picture of a shooting star! // After meeting Park Ranger Rose, the pups get stuck on a nature trail. But Rubble & Crew, finds a construction solution.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa’s playgroup is holding a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof and Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell. Peppa and her friends bring in an old toy but they soon realise that favourite toys can be hard to let go of.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are at the swimming pool. Rebecca Rabbit is there too. She and Peppa are very proud of their swimming skills. Everyone is surprised to discover that Daddy Pig is very good at swimming and diving. Very good indeed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mummy and Daddy Pig are taking Peppa and George to play in the playground. On the way it gets a bit foggy, and soon it is so foggy they can’t see. They decide to go home. But which way is home?

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: After a family trip to a mountain beauty spot, Daddy Pig loses the car keys down a very deep drain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit is to be given the Queen's Award for Industry, and Peppa and her friends are to accompany her to the palace to meet the Queen!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig, Granddad Dog, and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tim, Tommy, Tia and Dad get stuck on a remote asteroid. // Tim, Kai and Tommy try to get their ball back from Mum's bedroom. // Tia's new balloon gets stuck in a tree, so Tim tries to get it down.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: It's the Robot Championship - and only the fastest, strongest, smartest robot will win! Using coding, can Blaze win enough sports to take home the Robot Championship trophy?

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Yumi's new Robo- Corn Plucker goes haywire, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol must get it under control. // Daring Danny X, dressed as a "Bird X" mascot for the Adventure Bay, gets carried away by a couple of eagles who mistake him for one of their own!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Rocky and the Pups are fixing an Old-Timey Junk Car for Ace Sorensen's Birthday! // Adventure Bay is working hard to earn the record for having the world's highest tower of pizzas!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Sid Swashbuckle pretends to be a legendary ghost so that he can take Danny's new skateboard.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall! But when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: After the Pokey Pigeons eat all of Abuela's elotes, Dora and Boots set out to find more ingredients for the Great Abuela Cook-off. / Dora, Boots and Backpack play an adventurous game of Hide-and-Seek to find Map.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: William hosts his very own TV show. // Chucks and Ezra set out to find a special song.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: Shadow and Aggie learn to be nice. // The Toothfish Fairy asks Daddy Shark to take her place.

programme.title: Wrath Of The Titans
programme.desc: Taking place 10 years after his heroic defeat of the Kraken, Perseus (Sam Worthington) embarks on a treacherous quest into the underworld to rescue his father, overthrow the Titans and save mankind.

programme.title: Full House S1 11
programme.desc: Danny arrives at his surprise 30th birthday party only to discover that Jesse has accidentally driven his prized car into the bay.

programme.title: Full House S1 12
programme.desc: Three grown men experiencing the "joys of motherhood," as they raise three adorable girls in a Full House.

programme.title: Full House S1 13
programme.desc: Jesse suggests that D.J. audition for a commercial after she does well in a school performance. D.J. does well in her audition, but when she leaves the room, the part is given to Stephanie.

programme.title: Full House S1 14
programme.desc: Jesse uses baby Michelle to get a date with one of Danny's co-workers, but when a girlfriend of Jesse's tells the story of how she met Jesse with Michelle, Jesse's date is postponed indefinitely.

programme.title: Journey To The Center Of The Earth
programme.desc: During a scientific expedition to Iceland, scientist Trevor Anderson (Fraser-- Crash, The Mummy), his nephew Sean (Josh Hutcherson) and their local guide, Hannah (Anita Briem), are trapped in a cave -- from which their only escape is to go deeper, into unimagined worlds, where the trio comes face to face with never-before-seen creatures and harrowing dangers as they race an building volcanic eruption to reach the surface!

programme.title: Giant
programme.desc: Wealthy rancher Bick Benedict (Hudson) and dirt-poor cowboy Jett Rink (Dean) both woo Leslie Lynnton (Taylor) a beautiful young woman from Maryland who is new to Texas. She marries Benedict, but she is shocked by the racial bigotry of the White Texans against the local people of Mexican descent. Rink discovers oil on a small plot of land, and while he uses his vast, new wealth to buy all the land surrounding the Benedict ranch, the Benedict's disagreement over prejudice fuels conflict the runs across generations.

programme.title: Er S1 7
programme.desc: A drunk Chloe shows up in the hospital. Carol and Doug share a kiss. Benton and Langworthy are rivals for the Starzl fellowship.

programme.title: Er S1 8
programme.desc: Dr. Susan Lewis notices that Dr. Cvetic is ill-tempered lately. Benton has family problems. Carol takes care of a rape victim. Doug is overwhelmed by his position as acting chief.

programme.title: Full House S1 15
programme.desc: Danny is excited about the chance to play basketball with the Harlem Globetrotters, but when his family contracts chicken pox, finding a baby-sitter for Michelle seems impossible.

programme.title: Friends S5 4
programme.desc: The gang discovers that Phoebe hates PBS after Joey agrees to help out with a pledge drive. Emily tells Ross she'll give him a second chance only if he cuts all ties with Rachel.

programme.title: The Closer S7 16
programme.desc: Stroh (BILLY BURKE), but a shocking courtroom maneuver puts the case in jeopardy.

programme.title: The Closer S7 17
programme.desc: Provenza gets trapped into helping his first ex-wife, Liz (DIEDRE O'CONNELL -- You Don't Know Jack), recover her wedding ring after she is ripped off by a shady gold buyer.

programme.title: The Closer S7 18
programme.desc: A cancer doctor is brutally killed and his drug supply wiped clean. To make matters worse, Captain Raydor has a new assignment that leaves Brenda questioning her loyalty to Pope.

programme.title: The Closer S7 19
programme.desc: The murder of a priest drives a wedge between Brenda and Chief Pope. Meanwhile, Brenda's parents are in town while her father continues his cancer treatments.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 4
programme.desc: Bidders go head to head in a battle over some super heavyweight freight, a can filled to the brim with outdoor adventure equipment contains a unique surprise, and a tailgaters dream could stop its winner short of the goal line.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 5
programme.desc: The Israelis' go hard after what they think is vintage clothing, but will their fashion expertise pay off? Mo and Ty go postal when the doors swing open to reveal some mysterious machinery, and a custom container could land at least one buyer behindbars.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 5
programme.desc: T Money puts his honesty to the test with shocking revelations. Jesse finds a loser bin that could make him a winner. Brandon and Lori think they see treasure in an unlikely place. And the new kids in town are determined to throw everyone off their game.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 6
programme.desc: In a day filled with explosive surprises, Team Brandori looks for a big win as the Alvarado Brothers take a gamble and let the pros get under their skin. A fiery contraption has T Money wondering if he scored big or will go down in flames.

programme.title: The Closer S7 21
programme.desc: As Brenda investigates what was seen by a young hustler (GRAHAM PATRICK MARTIN), her obsession with Philip Stroh (BILLY BURKE) threatens not only her career, but also her life.

programme.title: Arrow S2 21
programme.desc: After the Mirakuru sends Roy into an uncontrollable rage and he unleashes on the city, Oliver realizes it's taken over completely, and he must figure out a way to stop him.

programme.title: AFLW - Round 7 - Adelaide Crows v Sydney Swans
programme.desc: The 2025 AFLW season encompasses 12 home and away rounds over 12 weeks, with no compression and four weeks of finals.

programme.title: Iconic Australia - The Beach
programme.desc: Danger, social codes and wild nature have all collided along the coast to create a unique Australian culture. It's the nation's verandah where champion surfers mingle with billionaires, babies, judges and crims in anonymity.

programme.title: Paradise Kitchen Bali - Episode 3
programme.desc: Lauren dives into the vibrant world of turmeric. From infusing it into dishes like Urap Pakis to crafting a healthful elixir called Jamu. Discover the captivating flavors against the breathtaking backdrop of Mount Agung.

programme.title: Adam and Poh's Great Australian Bites - Gippsland, Victoria
programme.desc: We're heading to one of Australia's great food bowls in the Gippsland region of Victoria to discover what it is we love about simple home cooking and attempt to make the ultimate Aussie family meal.

programme.title: ABC National News - Episode 271
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the day's top stories and latest news with more reporters to tell you what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: ABC Late News Weekend - Episode 78
programme.desc: When you need to know what's happening turn to ABC News for coverage you can trust. We bring you today's events from reporters across Australia, connecting communities and telling your stories. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: Offsiders - Episode 34
programme.desc: Abbey Gelmi presents the Offsiders AFL Grand Final Special, with all the fallout from yesterday's Premiership decider. Plus a look ahead to the NRL and NRLW Grand Finals after this weekend's Preliminary Finals.

programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show - Episode 32
programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani Gray and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: News Breakfast - Episode 194
programme.desc: As the day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and Emma Rebellato bring you the latest news, overnight developments and top stories, joined by Catherine Murphy on sport and Nate Byrne with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 194
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 194
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: A Bite To Eat With Alice - Rhonda Burchmore
programme.desc: Singing, dancing and acting cabaret queen Rhonda Burchmore twirls into the kitchen. Alice discovers Rhonda's other passion is fishing. So together they cook up a whole founder together - a meal fit for a dancing queen.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent - Episode 22
programme.desc: We are your passport to the world. Our stories, told through the ABC's network of foreign correspondents, will take you to incredible places where you'll meet the people and see the forces shaping our world.

programme.title: The Soundtrack of Australia - The Sounds We Can't Hear
programme.desc: Australia is a stunning country but we seldom listen to how it sounds. Dr Ann Jones is on an audio odyssey gathering iconic recordings of Australia. We examine the sounds we can't hear and those that break the rules. (Final)

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Newtown Impossible
programme.desc: A homeowner takes a tiny rundown heritage-listed workers cottage in the middle of the dense inner city Sydney suburb of Newtown and transforms it into a beautiful, fully sustainable off-grid home. (Final)

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing - Episode 176
programme.desc: In our fast-moving world, we unpack the latest in politics, shifting national affairs and the global events shaping our lives. Guest host Melissa Clarke asks the tough questions on the big issues to the key decision makers.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S1 E13 - Jenny's Low
programme.desc: With his dry-cleaning business booming, George Jefferson moves his family--level-headed wife Louise and son Lionel to the upper east side. But life in a luxurious Manhattan high-rise holds unexpected pitfalls for George.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S9 E13 - Dead Eye
programme.desc: Famed mystery writer Jessica Fletcher has a gift for solving mysteries and murder always follows her around, whether it be to the houses of her seemingly endless number of friends, nieces, and nephews, or right in her hometown.

programme.desc: Another year of marriage between mortal and witch has the Stephens trying to cope with Samantha's meddling, magical family and their daughter's entrance into nursery school.

programme.desc: An astronaut's life is thrown into chaos when he discovers a bottle that contains a beautiful female genie.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a camping trip inside a supposedly haunted forest despite warning not to do so. As night falls and camps are set, the complicated relationships of lust and love between them are exposed, triggering a series of paranormal events that punishes them. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: Jacqueline Comes Home: The Chiong Story
programme.desc: Based on a true crime that happened in 1997, the story is about an unknown assailant kidnapping two sisters, Jacqueline and Marijoy Chiong. This is one of the most shocking cases of rape and murder in Philippines history.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jia Hao and his friends gather to celebrate his birthday at a villa. However, the festivities take a dark turn when they connect to a deadly VR game in which they must light candles and dodge ghosts to survive. Tragedy strikes as two of his friends fall victim to the escalating horrors within, plunging them all deeper into a chilling nightmare.

programme.title: The Windmill Massacre
programme.desc: Jennifer joins a tour to explore the renowned windmills of the Netherlands. As their tour coach breaks down on the way, they seek refuge in a creepy shed near a sinister windmill with a dark history. When some tour members suddenly disappear, Jennifer discovers a shared secret among them, linking their fates in a chilling revelation.

programme.title: Mama Ghost
programme.desc: In a coastal town, a forbidden romance sparks between Rico and Sisca, and their love unleashes a malevolent spirit. As chilling deaths plague the town, past secrets are being unraveled and the town is possessed by evil and fear. Rico must defy destiny and fight against the evil spirit to save his loved one.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jing Wen, a struggling drama student, takes on a modelling job to help cover her tuition costs. As she becomes a model for an enigmatic artist specializing in expressive human body sketches, Jing Wen accidentally uncovers a shocking truth, plunging her into a desperate fight for survival.

programme.title: 7ujuh
programme.desc: 7 friends go on a road trip to a remote bungalow run by a village head and his daughter Suri. They host a party and ask Suri to help. Things spiral out of control and Suri is raped. Before killing herself, she curses them to be haunted in their dreams. As the friends are killed off one by one, they must break the curse to escape their deadly fate.

programme.title: Evie
programme.desc: When young Evie discovers a cursed necklace washed up on the beach, she is unaware of the malevolent force tied to it. As the necklace's dark power begins to grip her, she inadvertently awakens a deadly water demon intent on claiming her and everyone she holds dear.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A taxi driver who is constantly judging others by his own standards, also reads into their every move and sets out to help ‘victims’ in his own way. When a woman he likes seems to be bullied by her son, he goes about setting things right for her, even resorting to turning himself into a cold-blooded serial killer…

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady
programme.desc: Beautiful Alice has a successful career but is in love with a married man, thus becoming very lonely. She can only find companionship in her cleaning lady Shelly, a mysterious girl whose face is scarred by burns. As they become closer, Alice accidentally discovers Shelly's dark history and is soon embroiled in a horrific act of revenge.

programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: When an infant's body washes up on the shores of Deer Island, Massachusetts, residents rally to find out who she is, and what happened to her. Their unprecedented solidarity gets nationwide attention.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: After being pursued by handsome Kevin Lewis, Amanda can't wait to marry her new man. But on their honeymoon, Amanda discovers a different side to Kevin — he likes things done a certain way.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: DNA Speaks
programme.desc: When a Texas gas store owner, Subir Chatterjee, 58, is shot inside his cheque-cashing booth in 2002, detectives suspect his killer is someone Subir knew.

programme.title: The Garden City Butcher
programme.desc: Passing himself off as a friendly tourist in Singapore, he preyed on unsuspecting travellers, bludgeoning them to death before disposing their chopped up bodies.

programme.title: Murder At The Motel
programme.desc: July 1, 2021, Falls Township, Pennsylvania. Falls Township Police are dispatched to the New Falls Motel after receiving a call about an unresponsive female.

programme.title: Murder At The Motel
programme.desc: May 13, 2020, Reno, Nevada. Officers from the Reno Police Department are dispatched to the La Quinta Inn after several motel guests report hearing gunshots in the middle of the night.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Dead West
programme.desc: When Pam Shelly, 31, is found in her Cuero, Texas, bathroom with a fatal gunshot wound to the head, her death is initially ruled a suicide.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Dead West
programme.desc: In 1987 Carol Murphy, 28, is found by hikers slain in a wooded area of Lefthand Canyon, CO. Police uncover a turbulent love life and plenty of suspects in this Western enclave.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S2)
programme.desc: A young man is taken into custody for public intoxication, while a woman is arrested for lying to police. In Modesto, a teen is hit with a felony charge for criminal threats of violence.

programme.desc: A fateful choice tragically ends the life of an up-and-coming rapper.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 2
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 1
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.
